data.name: ctlCaptcha.Error
data.value: Incorrect security code was entered. Pleasse try again.

data.name: ctlCaptcha.TextBoxLabel
data.value: Enter the security code shown above into the box.

data.name: ctlCaptchaAudioLinkButton.Text
data.value: Get Audio Code

data.name: ctlCaptchaLinkButton.Text
data.value: Refresh Security Code

data.name: Invitation.Body
data.value:
Dear [Invitation:RecipientFirstName],

You have been invited by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] to register as a user on/join the [Portal:PortalName] website.

Simply click on the 'JOIN NOW' link below to use your one-time RSVP code to easily register for site membership.

If you do not wish to accept this invitation click on the "DECLINE INVITATION" link to indicate that you do not wish to receive further invitations to join this website.

{if ("[Invitation:AssignedUsername]" != "")}

Your Username will be: [Invitation:AssignedUsername]

{endif} {if ("[Invitation:TemporaryPassword]" != "")}

Your Temporary Password will be: [Invitation:TemporaryPassword]

After logging in you may change your password by clicking on your username shown in the top left corner of each website page.

{endif}

[Invitation:PersonalNote]

JOIN NOW    DECLINE INVITATION

data.name: Invitation.ButtonText
data.value: Send Invitation

data.name: Invitation.Html
data.value: Click on the button below to invite a friend, co-worker or family member to register for membership on this website. They will be sent an email containing a clickable link and RSVP code to allow them to easily register.

data.name: Invitation.Subject
data.value: Invitation from [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] to join the [Portal:PortalName] Website

data.name: InvitationProcessorPage.Text
data.value: Invitation Processor Page

data.name: Mapped.Text
data.value: Mapped

data.name: Unmapped.Text
data.value: Unmapped

data.name: SubmissionStatus.DuplicateEmail
data.value: The recipient email address is a duplicate of the recipient of another invitation or already registered site user in a site requiring that usernames be unique email addresses.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvalidRoleName
data.value: The role ({0}) you have requested be assigned to the recipient upon acceptance either does not exist or you are not authorized to assign the particular role. The role will not be assigned.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvalidPassword
data.value: The temporary password you have entered does not meet the requirements for a strong password. It may be too short or not contain a combination of letters, numbers, and/or punctuation characters or be on a list of banned passwords.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvalidRoleEffectiveDate
data.value: The effective date for the role ({0}) you have requested be assigned to the recipient upon acceptance is an invalid date. The role will be assigned with the current portal time as the effective date.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvitationAlreadyAccepted
data.value: The recipient has already accepted another invitation.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvitationAlreadyDeclined
data.value: The recipient has already declined another invitation and does not wish to receive future invitations.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvitationAlreadyPending
data.value: The recipient already has another invitation pending action.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.SubmittedTooSoon
data.value: Your invitation cannot be processed at this time as it is being submitted too soon after you submitted a previous invitation.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.Success
data.value: Your invitation has been successfully sent to the recipient.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.Undefined
data.value: An error has occured while processing this invitation, please try again later.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.UserAlreadyRegistered
data.value: The recipient is already a site user.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.UsernameAlreadyExists
data.value: The username has already been assigned in another pending invitation or is in use by an existing site user . Please select a different Username for this recipient.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvalidRoleExpiryDate
data.value: The expiry date for the role ({0}) you have requested be assigned to the recipient upon acceptance is an invalid date. The role will not be assigned.

data.name: Success.Text
data.value: Your invitation has been sent!

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvalidRedirectOnLogin
data.value: The name of the site tab to which the recipient should be redirected following acceptance and first login is invalid for this site. No redirection will occur.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvalidUsername
data.value: The username you have entered does not meet the site's requirements. It may be too short or contain illegal characters or profanity or be on a list of banned usernames.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvalidDisplayName
data.value: The display name you have entered does not meet the site's requirements. It may be too short or contain illegal characters or profanity or be on a list of banned display names.

data.value: Return

data.value: From:

data.value: A server error occurred when trying to save the invitation.

data.value: Approve and send the created invitation

data.name: Approve.Name
data.value: Approve

data.value: Disaprove the created invitation

data.name: Disapprove.Name
data.value: Disapprove

data.name: Accepted.Body
data.value: An invitation sent by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] on [Invitation:SentOnDate] has been accepted by the recipient, [Invitation:RecipientFullname], on [Invitation:AcceptedOnDate].

data.name: Accepted.Subject
data.value: An Invitation From [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] Has Been Accepted By [Invitation:AssignedDisplayname]

data.name: PendingModeration.Body
data.value:
The following invitation was created by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] on [Invitation:InvitedOnDate] and is awaiting approval by a moderator before being sent:
Recipient: [Invitation:RecipientFullname]
Recipient Email: [Invitation:RecipientEmail]
Personal Note: [Invitation:PersonalNote]
Assigned Username: [Invitation:AssignedUsername]
Assigned Displayname: [Invitation:AssignedDisplayname]
Redirect On Login Page: [Invitation:RedirectTabname]
Assigned Roles: [Invitation:AssignedRoles]

data.name: PendingModeration.Subject
data.value: An Invitation Created by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] Requires Moderator Approval

data.name: Declined.Body
data.value:
The invitation sent by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] on [Invitation:SentOnDate] has been declined by the recipient:
Recipient: [Invitation:RecipientFullname]
Recipient Email: [Invitation:RecipientEmail]
Declined At: [Invitation:DeclinedOnDate]
Reason Declined: {Invitation:ReasonDeclined]

data.name: Declined.Subject
data.value: An Invitation Sent By [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] Has Been Declined

data.name: Sent.Body
data.value:
The following invitation was sent by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] on [Invitation:SentOnDate]:
Recipient: [Invitation:RecipientFullname]
Recipient Email: [Invitation:RecipientEmail]
Assigned Displayname: [Invitation:AssignedDisplayname]

data.name: Sent.Subject
data.value: An Invitation Has Been Sent by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] to [Invitation:RecipientFullname]

data.name: Expired.Body
data.value:
The invitation sent by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] on [Invitation:SentOnDate] and resent [Invitation.ResentCount] times (most recently on [Invitation:LastResentOnDate]) has neither been declined nor accepted:
Recipient: [Invitation:RecipientFullname]
Recipient Email: [Invitation:RecipientEmail]
Invitation Expiration Date: [Invitation:ExpiresOnDate]
{if ("[Configuration:AutoDeleteArchiveExpiredInvitations]" == "Delete")}The expired invitation has been deleted.{endif}{if ("[Configuration:AutoDeleteArchiveExpiredInvitations]" == "Archive")}The expired invitation has been archived.{endif}

data.name: Expired.Subject
data.value: A Pending Invitation Sent To [Invitation.RecipientFullname] Has Expired

data.name: LockedOut.Body
data.value: Following [Invitation:FailedAttempCount] failed attempts to accept the an invitation sent on [Invitation:SentOnDate] by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname], the invitee has been locked out from making further attempts until [Invitation:LockedOutUntilDate].

data.name: LockedOut.Subject
data.value: Invitation Recipient [Invitation:RecipientFullname] Locked Out After [Invitation:FailedAttemptCount] Failed Attempts To Accept Invitation

data.name: Retracted.Body
data.value:
An invitation sent to [Invitation:RecipientFullname] on [Invitation:SentOnDate] was retracted on [Invitation:RetractedOnDate]:
Invited By User: [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname]
Recipient Email: [Invitation:RecipientEmail]
Retracted By User: [Invitation:RetractedByUserDisplayname]

data.name: Retracted.Subject
data.value: A Pending Invitation Sent To [Invitation:RecipientFullname] Has Been Retracted

data.name: SubmissionStatus.TemporaryPasswordRequired
data.value: Assignment of a temporary password is required when invitations are submitted by users who are permitted to assign credentials.

data.name: Errored.Body
data.value:
The following error occured during the creation, sending, management, or processing of site registration invitations:
Date and Time of Error: [DateTime:Now]
Website: [Portal:PortalName]

data.name: Errored.Subject
data.value: An Invitation Processing Error Has Occured

data.value: Edit then approve the created invitation

data.value: Edit Approve

data.name: SubmissionStatus.DuplicateDisplayName
data.value: The assigned DisplayName is a duplicate of the recipient of another invitation or already registered site user in a site requiring that DisplayNames be unique.

data.name: SubmissionStatus.InvalidRole
data.value: A server error occurred when attempting to pre-assign a role to the recipient of the invitation.

data.name: Approved,Subject
data.value: A Moderated Invitation From [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayName] Has Been Approved

data.name: Approved.Body
data.value:
The following moderated invitation was approved on [Invitation:ApprovedOnDate] and will shortly be sent to the recipient:
InvitedBy: [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayName]
Recipient: [Invitation:RecipientFullname]
Recipient Email: [Invitation:RecipientEmail]
Recipient Display Name: [Invitation:AssignedDisplayname]

data.name: Disapproved.Body
data.value:
The following moderated invitation was disapproved on [Invitation:DisapprovedOnDate] and will not be sent to the recipient:
InvitedBy: [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayName]
Recipient: [Invitation:RecipientFullname]
Recipient Email: [Invitation:RecipientEmail]
Recipient Display Name: [Invitation:AssignedDisplayname]

data.name: Disapproved.Subject
data.value: A Moderated Invitation From [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayName] Has Been Disapproved

data.name: InvitationsCreated.Text
data.value: Invitations Created: {0}

data.name: SubmissionStatus.RequiredFieldDataMissing
data.value: Data is missing for a required invitation field during a bulk import.

data.name: Resent.Body
data.value:
An invitation originally created by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] on [Invitation:CreatedOnDate] was resent to the recipient:
Recipient Full Name: [Invitation:RecipientFullname]
Recipient Email: [Invitation:RecipientEmail]
Resent On: [Invitation:LastResentOnDate]
Resent Count: [Invitation:ResentCount]
Expires On: [Invitation:ExpiresOnDate]

data.name: Resent.Subject
data.value: Invitation Resent by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] to [Invitation:RecipientFullname]

data.name: Created.Body
data.value:
The following invitation was created by [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] on [Invitation:InvitedOnDate]:
Recipient: [Invitation:RecipientFullname]
Recipient Email: [Invitation:RecipientEmail]
Personal Note: [Invitation:PersonalNote]
Assigned Username: [Invitation:AssignedUsername]
Assigned Displayname: [Invitation:AssignedDisplayname]
Redirect On Login Page: [Invitation:RedirectTabname]
Assigned Roles: [Invitation:AssignedRoles]

data.value: Effective: {0:d}

data.value: Expires: {0:d}

data.value: [Invitation:InvitedByUserDisplayname] Has Invited [Invitation:RecipientFullname] to Register for Site Membership

data.value: Notifications Sent: {0}

data.name: FileUploadError.Text
data.value: Import file upload failed with error:

data.name: FileUploadStreamError.Text
data.value: Import file upload stream is empty or closed or no filename was provided.

data.name: Finished.Body
data.value:
The bulk import of invitations started by [BulkImport:ImportedByUserDisplayname] on [BulkImport:ImportedOnDate] has finished on [BulkImport:FinishedOnDate]. Detailed results follow:
Read Started: [BulkImport:ReadStartedOnDate]
Read Finished: [BulkImport:ReadFinishedOnDate]
Records Read: [BulkImport:RecordsRead]
Records Skipped: [BulkImport:RecordsSkipped]
Invitations Created: [BulkImport:InvitationsCreated]
Send Started: [BulkImport:SendStartedOnDate]
Send Finished: [BulkImport:SendFinishedOnDate]
Invitations Sent: [BulkImport:InvitationsSent]
ErrorCount: [BulkImport:ErrorCount]
AbortedOnDate: [BulkImport:AbortedOnDate]
CanceledOnDate: [BulkImport:CanceledOnDate]
FinishedOnDate: [BulkImport:FinishedOnDate]
{if ([BulkImport:ErrorCount] > 0 || "[BulkImport:AbortedOnDate]" != "---")}Bulk Import Log:
[BulkImport:BulkImportLog]{endif}

data.name: Finished.Subject
data.value: A Bulk Import of Invitations Has Finished

data.value: Are you sure you want to disapprove this invitation?

data.name: Approve.Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you wish to approve and send this invitation?
